name: Apple
description: An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree. Apple trees are cultivated worldwide

name: BlueBerry
description: Blueberries are a widely distributed and widespread group of perennial flowering plants

name: Jackfruit
description: The jackfruit, also known as jack tree, is a species of tree in the fig, mulberry, and breadfruit family.

name: Mango
description: A mango is an edible stone fruit produced by the tropical tree Mangifera indica which is believed to have originated from the region pakistan

name: Orange
description: An orange is a fruit of various citrus species in the family Rutaceae; it primarily refers to Citrus

name: Pineapple
description: The pineapple (Ananas comosus) is a tropical plant with an edible fruit; it is the most economically efficient.
